articles.author: Rob Verdonck, Richard Henderson
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for April 28 - Bloomberg
articles.description: European equity futures rose with Asian shares after technology earnings bolstered Wall Street. The yen weakened as the Bank of Japan kept its ultra-loose monetary policy settings.
articles.content:
European equity futures rose with Asian shares after technology earnings bolstered Wall Street. The yen weakened as the Bank of Japan kept its

articles.title: First Lunar Eclipse Of 2023 — Check Date, Time And Visibility - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The first lunar eclipse of the year will not be visible from India, but can be viewed in Europe, Africa, Pacific, Australia, Asia, Atlantic and the Indian Ocean. It will be a 'penumbral' event.
articles.content:
The first lunar eclipse of the year is set to take place next month. The celestial event will be a penumbral lunar eclipse. There will be two lunar eclipses in all this year in May and October.
